name: Moon Tide
description:
Moon Tide is an atmospheric game level with mystery and puzzle elements. Interact with the scene in this strange and surreal dreamscape to uncover what happened.

I would be greatly appreciative of any playthroughs, feedbacks, or roastings as it will help me grow as a designer.   It should take 10-20 minutes to complete.

 I hope you enjoy it!

Controls:
Left click - Interact
Right Click - Drop current item

Thank you,
Alex
